```{r}
#| echo: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| code-fold: true

library(tidyverse)
library(mosaic)
library(fivethirtyeight)
```

```{r}
#| code-fold: true
data(bechdel)
new_bechdel <- bechdel |>
  mutate(clean_test = factor(clean_test, c("nowomen", "notalk", "men", "dubious", "ok"))) |>
  mutate(half_decades = cut(year, breaks = seq(1969, 2014, by = 5)))
```

```{r, fig.cap = "Created by Madeleine Heafey"}
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| code-fold: true
ggplot(new_bechdel, aes(x = budget_2013, y = domgross_2013)) +
  geom_point(size = 0.5, alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE) +
  labs(title = "Movie Budget vs. Domestic Box Office Gross", x = "Movie Budget", y = "Domestic Office")
```
